aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.message: Ambitious and technology-loving, seeking to leverage programming skills to create solutions for automating and streamlining daily routines.

projects.title: Projects
projects.card1: A PHP-based Instagram clone with CRUD functionality for posts and user creation. Designed to deliver a user-friendly interface and seamless experience for managing social media content.
projects.card2: An integrated system with the GalaxPay payment platform, capturing customer data from the integrated platform for card printing, generating new contracts, managing company finances, and featuring access levels. User: admin Pass: admin
projects.card3: A Tic Tac Toe project using jQuery and CSS, one of my first projects in pure jQuery, is an excellent way to have fun playing a classic game and testing your strategic skills.
projects.card4: A landing page for 'Sa√∫de em Riqueza' with a lead conversion questionnaire. (Vue 2)
projects.card5: A high-conversion sales landing page for 'MoneySage' with various persuasive animations to drive sales (Vue 2).
projects.card6: A sales landing page with a clear call to action for the 'Banking Law course with Cinthia Magrini' (Vue 2).
